job description:
JOB PURPOSE

Deliver and discover essential business information for executive management, leadership and associates. This position manages a team of Analysts that will be the central hub for understanding, defining and efficiently reporting data and business insights for all lines of business within Core Banking.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Manage and direct day to day activities of the Frontline Data and Reporting Analyst team to ensure that all timelines are met, and quality work is performed.
  • Coach and develop talent while driving the team's vision, purpose and results.
  • Takes personal initiative and is a positive example for Analysts to emulate.
  • Proactively analyzes business trends and drivers providing recommendations to support business decisions.
  • Review, consolidate and enhance current report set to ensure it meets business needs.
  • Identify and communicate positive and negative trends to leadership for strategy and problem resolution.
  • Work with Centralized Reporting and Customer Analytics to ensure that the Bank has a comprehensive information set to support day to day functions in Core Banking.
  • Assess and optimize existing analytics tools and techniques, select best in class tools and technologies to support overall Data Analytics strategy.
  • Work in partnership with other analytics teams at the Bank to create a common and centralized set of data definitions that reflect the core drivers of the business.
  • Demonstrates compliance with all bank regulations for assigned job function and applies to designated job responsibilities -- knowledge may be gained through coursework and on-the-job training. Keeps up to date on regulation changes.
  • Follows all Bank policies and procedures, compliance regulations, and completes all required annual or job-specific training.
  • Maintain a working knowledge of Bank's written policies and procedures regarding Bank Secrecy Act, Regulation CC, Regulation E, Bank Security and other regulations as applicable to this job description.
  • Embraces our vision to become "The World's Greatest Bank."
  • May perform other duties as assigned.
SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES 4+ employees

REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES
  • Requires bachelor's degree in business, finance, or accounting.
  • More than 5+ years of progressively growing responsibilities with a strong focus on data analysis and reporting and 3-5 years of supervising and directing technical associates performing complex tasks.
  • Experience developing processes, leading people and driving initiatives toward common goals.
  • Experience with data stores, data architecture, data management, data visualization, and data analytics.
  • Experience implementing data management processes and new applications a plus.
  • Demonstrated ability to provide actionable insights from data and make recommendations for improved business performance.
  • Ability to analyze and extract key trends from large data sets.
  • Ability to present to large/executive audiences in a clear and concise manner.
  • Experience negotiating difficult subjects between multiple executive stakeholders with different agendas.
  • Proven experience of driving results, customer focus, managing complexity, dealing with ambiguity and strong verbal and written communication skills.
  • Advanced understanding of Microsoft Office product suite with proficient use of Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, and Word. Proficiency in Excel and SQL; previous experience with data visualization tools or languages (Visio, Tableau, Power BI or VBA).
PHYSICAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL DEMANDS
  • Office environment -- no specific or unusual physical or environmental demands.
  • Occasional travel.
Umpqua Bank is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, protected veteran status, or disability. We maintain a drug-free workplace and may perform pre-employment substance abuse testing.
  • LI-UP
